title: Synergizing AI and CPU: Empowering Next-Generation Computing
abstract: This paper explores the integration of AI with CPUs to enhance computational efficiency and performance through architectural innovations and workload optimization techniques.

title: Advancements in Space Debris Mitigation: Decomposition Strategies and Alternative Materials for Sustainable Space Exploration
abstract: This study examines strategies for mitigating space debris using decomposition techniques and alternative materials to ensure sustainable space exploration.

title: Enhancing Home Security with AI-Driven Drone Surveillance
abstract: This research focuses on using AI-driven drones for home security, highlighting advancements in surveillance technology, autonomous navigation, and threat detection.
